title: Queen Bee 100% All-Natural, Organic Under Eye Cream - Removes Dark Circles, Facial Lines and Wrinkles Naturally
description: Queen Bee Eye Cream is carefully hand made using only the highest quality 100% All-Natural Ingredients. This wonderful cream removes under eye circles, fades facial lines and wrinkles and keeps skin around the eye looking healthy, youthful and vibrant. All without harmful and dangerous chemicals found in most store bought skin care products. Queen Bee Eye Cream works because we do not skimp on the quality of the ingredients. the National Institute of Occupational Safety and Health has stated that nearly 900 of the chemicals that are used in most cosmetics and skin care product are toxic and cancer causing. Most mass produced, brand name skin care products have a long list of hard to pronounce chemicals and often these products use the cheapest ingredients possible. Even so called organic or all natural cosmetic products will use chemicals or dyes during processing that are not listed on the label. Even the fragrances found in skin care products can be carcinogenic. Queen Bee Eye Cream is one of the few cosmetic products available that uses all-natural, organic ingredients and is 100% chemical free.
brand: All Natural & Handmade in the Pocono Mountains

title: Babyface Complete Eye Cream (15 ml.) w/ Caffeine + 5% Haloxyl, 3% Eyeliss, 40% Matrixyl 3000 & Tranexamic Acid: Puffy Eye Reduction, Wrinkle Repair & Dark Circle Treatment
description: 15 ml / 0.5 oz.High potency! 3% Eyeliss & 5% Haloxyl. Plus, maximum strength Matrixyl 3000, Tranexamic Acid and Caffeine!BABYFACE Complete Eye Treatment Creme is hands down the most complete eye treatment product available! Packed with all the essentials... this cream moisturizes, smoothes fine lines, repairs cell damage, helps to reduce puffiness and dark circles, and brightens the eyes for a refreshed look everyday!  The perfect product for those looking for something specifically formulated for the delicate eye area. The formula is moisturizing, but light, and non-oily - so it will not cause millia to those who are prone. With it's high-end list of ingredients, and maximum amounts of them, this is possibly one of the best eye creams you can buy today.TO USE:  Use very sparingly - Gently touch tip of finger to product, and apply to under eye area and eye lid. Use morning and night for maximum results.
